system.sustained:
Psyker creates an Psy Rating Radius Psychic Blast centred around a point in range that deals 1d10+3 Rending Damage with Crippling(1d10), Snare(2), and Tearing Qualities.
Crippling(X): If target suffers at least 1 Wound, for rest of encounter or until healed of all damage, if it takes more than a half action it suffers X damage to the same location it took damage originally from (Ignores Armour/Toughness).
Snare(X): Target makes Agility Test with -10*X. Failiure causes target to be immobilised, target can make Strength or Agility Test to Escape (same Penalty Applies).
Tearing: Roll one additional damage die, discard the lower result.
